data.name: Solenars Edge II: Aurora of The Seventh Dawn Donation
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is 100 percent optional and helps support the creation of future Team Syukino games as well as some possible updates to previous ones.
This does not effect gameplay at all and is purely for donation purposes.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC is 100 percent optional and helps support the creation of future Team Syukino games as well as some possible updates to previous ones.
This does not effect gameplay at all and is purely for donation purposes.
data.short_description: Support Team Syukino by donating to them by purchasing the donation DLC!

fullgame.name: Solenars Edge II: Aurora of The Seventh Dawn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Microsoft Windows® 7/8.1/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

data.legal_notice: Solenars Edge II: Aurora of The Seventh Dawn and the Solenars Edge Series is the property of Team Syukino.
